sentences.en: A small group of journalists waited on the pavement outside her house.
sentences.cn: 有一小群记者守候在她家外面的人行道上。

sentences.en: As she fell off the bike, her head hit the pavement.
sentences.cn: 她从自行车上摔下来，头部撞在了路面上。

sentences.en: Crews stray outside to film the view from the pavement.
sentences.cn: 工作人员移到人行道上拍摄这一景色。

sentences.en: He cracked his head on the pavement and was knocked cold.
sentences.cn: 他一头撞到人行道上，不省人事了。

sentences.en: He stopped his bike just off the pavement.
sentences.cn: 他把自行车就停在人行道旁边.

sentences.en: He was then shoved face down on the pavement.
sentences.cn: 接着他被一把推倒，脸朝下趴在了人行道上。

sentences.en: I dropped my camera on the pavement and bust it.
sentences.cn: 我把照相机掉在人行道上摔坏了.

sentences.en: Inertia carried the car to the pavement.
sentences.cn: 惯性使汽车驶到了人行道上.

sentences.en: No vehicles were allowed to drive along the pavement.
Several pedestrians had come to grief on the icy pavement.
sentences.cn: 几个行人在结冰的人行道上滑倒了.

sentences.en: She stamped her feet on the pavement to keep out the cold.
sentences.cn: 她在人行道上跺着双脚取暖。

sentences.en: The lorry had been parked on the pavement, causing an obstruction.
sentences.cn: 卡车停在人行道上, 引起了堵塞.

sentences.en: There are some delightful Victorian houses fronting onto the pavement.
sentences.cn: 面对人行道有一些漂亮的维多利亚时代的房子。

sentences.en: There were pools of blood and gore on the pavement.
sentences.cn: 人行道上有一摊摊血和血块。

sentences.en: They made their getaway along a pavement on a stolen motorcycle.
sentences.cn: 他们骑上偷来的摩托车沿着人行道逃走了。

sentences.en: Two cars skidded on the icy pavement.
sentences.cn: 两辆汽车在结冰的路面上打滑。

trans.tran_cn: 人行道，石板铺的地面，路面
trans.tran_en: a hard level surface or path at the side of a road for people to walk on
